attributes.action: Condemn the English Defence League as a racist and violent organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The English Defence League has taken a few hundred football hooligans on the streets of several of our major cities. In Nottingham recently they were shouting 'Allah, Allah, who the XXXX is Allah'. They claim to stand against extremism and yet they are extremist. This is an organisation that stands against faith and difference. They should be condemned by all tolerant, decent British people.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
